message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: yeah imagin. *imagine. this guy proposes to you at 17. you reject him.
Him: Him: um.
Her: And then five years later, he becomes a billionaire entrepreneur. Talk about a missed opportunity!
Him: Guess I didn't see the future clearly back then. I'll stick to stocks now, lol.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: yeah imagin. *imagine. this guy proposes to you at 17. you reject him.
Him: Him: um.
Her: Who would've thought that the geeky guy with braces would end up being a famous Hollywood actor? Life's full of surprises.
Him: Well, I guess I could've offered you a role in my blockbuster movie instead. Missed your chance, lmao.

CONVERSATION 3
Her: yeah imagin. *imagine. this guy proposes to you at 17. you reject him.
Him: Him: um.
Her: And then he starts his own tech company at 19 and becomes the next Elon Musk. Just my luck, right?
Him: Don't worry, babe, I'll send you a Tesla as a consolation prize. Keep fantasizing, haha.

CONVERSATION 4
Her: yeah imagin. *imagine. this guy proposes to you at 17. you reject him.
Him: Him: um.
Her: Imagine if he becomes a famous singer and you hear your own rejection story in one of his heartbreak songs. Talk about awkward, lol.
Him: Well, maybe I'll get heartbroken again and write a song about someone who missed out on the greatest love story ever. Keep an ear out for it, babe.

CONVERSATION 5
Her: yeah imagin. *imagine. this guy proposes to you at 17. you reject him.
Him: Him: um.
Her: And then he becomes the youngest Nobel Prize winner while you're still trying to figure out what to major in. Talk about a plot twist, lol.
Him: Hey, no worries, I'll dedicate my Nobel Prize speech to you. Thanks for inspiring me to achieve greatness, babe.
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : yeah imagin. *imagine. this guy proposes to you at 17. you reject him.  
    Him : Him : um. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
